summary: compiler plugin for Intel Fortran compiler
name: compilerifort.vim
description:
This is a compiler plugin for Intel Fortran compiler.

If you find any bug, please report it to xuhdev@gmail.com, or submit it on the
issue tracker:
https://bitbucket.org/xuhdev/compiler-ifort.vim/issues

Repository:
https://bitbucket.org/xuhdev/compiler-ifort.vim/src
install_details: Download the compiler-ifort.zip file and extract it to your vim runtime directory (~/.vim on UNIX/Linux and $VIM_INSTALLATION_FOLDER\vimfiles on windows).
